directions: Heat oil in a large saute pan.  Add onions, and sprinkle with ginger and paprika.  Saute until onions are golden.
Place chicken on top of onions.  Add about 1 to 2 cups of water, lemon juice, salt, pepper, and olives.  Cook about 1 hour, or until the chicken is tender.
ingredients: 1 (2 to 3 pound) whole chicken, cut into pieces
title: Olive Chicken I
